sourcesContent:
import "./VideoDetails.scss" function VideoDetails(props){ const flieredVideos=props.videoData.filter(video=>video.id!==props.currentVideoId); return( <>
{/*

{props.video.title}

*/}

By{props.video.channel}

{props.video.timestamp}

{props.video.views}

{props.video.likes}

{props.video.description}

Comments

{flieredVideos.map(video=>(<>

{video.comments.name}

{video.comments.timestamp}

{video.comments.comment}

))}
) } export default VideoDetails
